abstract: Landry Joel Tsafack N'Guémo (born 28 November 1985 in Yaoundé, Cameroon) is a Cameroonian footballer who currently plays as a defensive midfielder for Ligue 1 club Bordeaux.
comment: Landry Joel Tsafack N'Guémo (born 28 November 1985 in Yaoundé, Cameroon) is a Cameroonian footballer who currently plays as a defensive midfielder for Ligue 1 club Bordeaux.
